post.text:
#TamilNadu chief minister #MKStalin hit out at #YogiAdityanath, after the UP CM criticised Stalin over the three-#language row and #delimitation, saying that Tamil Nadu CM was trying to create divisions based on region and language.

Know more 
toi.in/VmoBjb0
